page.title: 19BARGOD RANGERS FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: The Bargod Rangers Football club was formed in 1897, and when the Cardigan- shire Football League was formed in 1921, the club was one of the initial members. Although the club has achieved a number of successes, none can be as notable as the Triple Trophy victories in 1957/58. The task of winning the League Championship,the Cardigan Bay Cup, the Cardiganshire League Cup was accomplished for the first time by a Club since the League's inauguration.The same feat was repeated in 1962/63.In 1975 we saw the Official Opening of the new Changing Rooms at Parc Puw, Drefach. Then in 1978, we saw the official opening of the new ground surface/ drainage scheme which was installed at a cost of Â£20,000.In 1937/38 an ex club member, Oswald Davies gained a Welsh Amateur Cap. {MR.MICHAEL DAVIES
